**ONLINE DATABASES,**         **e-JOURNALS &  e-BOOKS** ALERT: Excessive downloading of UTM Library e-resources is subject to a serious offense which may result in suspension of your UTM ID. AVOID the following: 1\. Opening multiple tabs at a time. 2\. Downloading more than 5 chapters/articles at a time. 3\. Downloading more than 100MB in 15 minutes. Please use Mozilla Firefox browser to view this webpage. * [Subscribed Databases](https://library.utm.my/digital-resources-2#) * [Subscribed e-Journals](https://library.utm.my/digital-resources-2#) * [E-Books](https://library.utm.my/digital-resources-2#) * [E-Standards](https://library.utm.my/digital-resources-2#) * [UTM Scholars](https://library.utm.my/digital-resources-2#) **_Trouble to download the fulltext pdf? **SOCIETY
**Presenting an array of ebooks containing peer-reviewed, novel research that provides a deeper look into a topic. They cover research from 1949 to the present and provide over 37,000 chapters across more than 1,700 ebooks. These ebooks contain essential research by the world’s leading scientists, including the work of 42 Nobel Laureates. Many ACS ebooks are sponsored by ACS Technical Divisions. You’ll find relevant content in almost every discipline impacted by chemistry, including policy, history and education. | 2020 – 2022 | \*[![](https://library.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/icon-jpg.jpg)](https://library.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/ACS_ebook-title-list.pdf) | | | [**Airport Development Reference Manual (ADRM) Edition 12 –**](https://login.vitalsource.com/?redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fbookshelf.vitalsource.com%2Freader%2Fbooks%2FADRM-9037-12%2Fepubcfi%2F6%2F58%5B%253Bvnd.vst.idref%253Dadrm-glo-en%5D%21%2F4&brand=bookshelf.vitalsource.com)

**[NSTITUTION OF CIVIL ENGINEERS (ICE)](http://www.icevirtuallibrary.com/content/books)

**The ICE eBook Collection covers every major discipline in the field of civil engineering. Fully searchable across 13 subject specific areas, 1500+ titles and over 401,000 pages, it constitutes the largest civil engineering ebook collection in the world. Renowned works in the collection include the industry leading CESMM – The Civil Engineering Standard Method of Measurement, now in its Fourth edition; Civil Engineering Procedure, Eighth edition; and the pioneering ICE Manual Series, covering eight disciplines, with more being planned. | 1893 – 2014 | [\*](https://library.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/ICE_ebook-title-list.pdf)
[![](https://library.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/icon-jpg.jpg)](https://library.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/ICE_ebook-title-list.pdf) | | | [**IET DIGITAL LIBRARY**](https://digital-library.theiet.org/content/books)

Presenting an array of works by authors affiliated with renowned global institutions, the IET has consistently published 50 to 60 new books annually in recent years. The IET eBook collections now offer an acclaimed selection of over 800 scholarly and practitioner-focused titles spanning 40 years. These collections strike a balance between rigorous academic research and real-world industrial applications, encompassing both cutting-edge technologies and established areas of study. Featured disciplines include Energy Engineering, Electromagnetic Waves, Control, Robotics & Sensors, Radar, Sonar & Navigation, Materials, Circuits & Devices, ICT & Cybersecurity, Healthcare Technology, Transportation, and more. | 1979 – 2012 | * [![](https://library.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/icon-jpg.jpg)](https://library.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/IET-Digital-Library_ebook-title-list.pdf) | | | [**IG PUBLISHING**](http://portal.igpublish.com.ezproxy.utm.my/iglibrary/) | 2012-2014 | | | | [**IGI GLOBAL**](https://www.igi-global.com/) | | [\*](https://drive.google.com/file/d/19wHUh6m1eox4uErBQg7y2Hgjx8s91zAy/view?usp=sharing)
